title: Lost focus on RDP's in SmartSize mode.
author: janborup
body_snippet:
I'm using "RDP's" in SmartSize mode, and each time i'm hitting [Alt + TAB] or [Win + TAB], and back to mRemote, it has lost fokus on the RDP session, and you had to click with the mouse in the window to get focus

The current version "mRemoteNG 1.78.2 NB 3137" (and many PreRelease versions before), has this focus problem, but is work in the last stable version.

Maybe reference to: https://github.com/mRemoteNG/mRemoteNG/issues/520

Can you help here @Kvarkas

comments.snippet: yes we know about this issue, will be looking next, once sort main list

comments.snippet:
Implemented fork-side fix package for this bug:

- upstream PR: https://github.com/mRemoteNG/mRemoteNG/pull/3116
- fix scope:
  - refocus active connection when app re-activates (`WM_ACTIVATEAPP`) unless `DisableRefocus` is enabled
  - resilient active-tab lookup fallback in `frmMain.ActivateConnection()` for cases where `ConnectionWindow.ActiveControl` is transient
- fork CI evidence:
  - https://github.com/robertpopa22/mRemoteNG/actions/runs/21789349478
